abilities.desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain. Spectral Dagger applies an instance of Desolate to targets with no allied units within 400 radius of them.
abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.notes: There is a 1.0 second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.

abilities.desc: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 400 radius around them.
abilities.name: Desolate

abilities.desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.notes: Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.

abilities.desc: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
abilities.name: Reality

abilities.desc: Allows Spectre to perform a single target Haunt on a visible enemy. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.
abilities.name: Shadow Step

abilities.desc: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
abilities.name: Haunt
